text: England competed at the 1990 Commonwealth Games in Auckland, New Zealand, between 24 January and 3 February 1990. England finished second in the medal table. ==Medal table (top three)== The athletes that competed are listed below. ==Athletics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !width=250| Name
